title: Beetroot Aloo Koora
ingredients: ['4 large red beetroots - trimmed, peeled and cut into cubes', '3 potatoes, peeled and cut into small cubes', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/2 teaspoon skinned split black lentils (urad dal)', '1/2 teaspoon mustard seed', '1/2 teaspoon cumin seed', '2 dried red chillies, broken into pieces', '1 pinch asafoetida powder', '6 fresh curry leaves', '1/2 teaspoon ground red pepper', '4 tablespoons desiccated coconut']
